mapper.select: SELECT A.food_id, A.food_name, A.food_price, A.food_measurement, A.food_has_sold, A.food_introduce, A.food_img, B.adminName AS createUser, C.adminName AS updateUser FROM food A INNER JOIN admin B ON A.create_user = B.admin_uuid LEFT JOIN admin C ON A.update_user = C.admin_uuid WHERE A.is_del = 0 AND A.food_id = #{foodId}
